text:
He took the key from his coat.  
“Take it! Make haste!”  

Dounia rushed to the table.  
“Make haste! Make haste!”  

---

Dounia snatched the key,  
flew to the door.  
Svidrigaïlov stood at the window,  
a strange smile twisted his face.  

---

He washed his temple,  
blood smeared on his hand.  
The revolver caught his eye.  
“It could be fired again.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Svidrigaïlov urges Dounia to take a key and escape, revealing his despair and contemplating the revolver she discarded.
